mapper.select: SELECT b.user_nickname, a.post_title, a.post_content, a.post_create_at, a.view_count, a.post_id FROM tbl_post a JOIN tbl_member b ON a.user_id = b.user_id
SELECT post_title, post_content, view_count FROM tbl_post ORDER BY view_count DESC
SELECT b.user_nickname, a.* FROM tbl_post a JOIN tbl_member b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE post_id = #{postId}

SELECT a.post_title, a.post_content, a.post_create_at, a.view_count, a.small_category_id, c.big_category_id FROM tbl_post a JOIN tbl_category_small b ON a.small_category_id = b.small_category_id JOIN tbl_category_big c ON b.big_category_id = c.big_category_id WHERE a.small_category_id = #{ smallCategoryId } AND c.big_category_id = #{ bigCategoryId }

SELECT b.user_nickname, a.post_title, a.post_content, a.post_create_at, a.view_count, a.post_id, a.small_category_id FROM tbl_post a JOIN tbl_member b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE a.user_id = #{ userCode }

SELECT a.post_id, a.post_title, a.post_content, a.post_create_at, a.view_count, a.small_category_id, c.big_category_id FROM tbl_post a JOIN tbl_category_small b ON a.small_category_id = b.small_category_id JOIN tbl_category_big c ON b.big_category_id = c.big_category_id WHERE a.user_id = #{ userCode } AND a.small_category_id = #{ smallCategoryId }
